Buttons


This is the default Foundation button.

Button

Buttons can have a .radius or be .round

Radius Round

Buttons come in 4 sizes.

.tiny .small (normal) .large

Buttons can have icons with text or just the icon.

Icon Icon Icon Icon


Buttons with the .expand class will fit their container.

Expanded Button

You can tell a button to only expand on mobile with .expand-for-small-only Extended

Expand for Small Only

Buttons can be .disabled Extended

Disabled

Buttons can be .success / .alert / .secondary.
Caution: these styles won't yet work with special styles below.

Success Alert Secondary

Special Styles liquidvisual


Add dimension and shadow to buttons with .depth

depth depth depth depth

Or create a subtle cellshading effect with .cellshade

Button Button Button Button

Use .flat to strip shadows.

Flat

Buttons can have a .gradient too.

Gradient

Applying .candy will add a subtle gloss.

Candy Candy

Use .knockout to use just the outline.

Knockout
